name: AlerioÂ¹

topics.response_text: {Strip}The eyes of the mighty{KAI-zar}Caesar are upon you. He admires your accomplishments, and bestows upon you the exceptional gift of his Mark.

topics.topic_text: You said Caesar has an offer for me. What kind of offer?
topics.response_text: {KAI-zar}Caesar chose not to give me that information. I was only told to find you and bring you the message.

topics.topic_text: If this is a trap, I'm going to take a lot of you with me.
topics.response_text: {offended}The mighty{KAI-zar}Caesar has bestowed upon you his Mark and guaranteed safe-conduct. If he wanted you dead, you would be dead already.

topics.topic_text: Tell Caesar I accept his invitation.
topics.response_text: {Strip}Seek{KAI-zar}Caesar by way of Cottonwood Cove, south of Nelson. The Cursor Lucullus will be waiting.

topics.topic_text: How did you find me here?
topics.response_text: I am one of{KAI-zar's}Caesar's{froo-men-TAR-ee}Frumentarii, an infiltrator, a spy. You were not difficult to track.

topics.topic_text: Why does Caesar want to see me?
topics.response_text: Go to him, and you will understand.

topics.topic_text: How do you know about Benny?
topics.response_text: Little escapes the notice of{KAI-zar}Caesar. He has eyes everywhere.

description:
Alerio is a 35 year-old Caucasian Male.

Alerio is a seasoned frumentarius of Caesar's Legion, operating in the shadows of the New Vegas Strip. With keen eyes and a sharp mind, he observes the comings and goings of everyone who enters the casinos, gathering vital intelligence for Caesar's conquest of the Mojave. Dressed in inconspicuous traveler's attire, he blends seamlessly into the crowd while maintaining his unwavering loyalty to the Legion.

Alerio's Personality: Cunning, observant, disciplined, and fiercely loyal to Caesar. Alerio operates with quiet efficiency, preferring to gather information without drawing attention to himself. He is patient and calculating, always thinking several steps ahead. Despite his role as an informant, he carries himself with an air of quiet authority that hints at his true allegiance.

Alerio's Backstory: Born in Arizona, Alerio was identified early for his exceptional observational skills and unwavering loyalty. Recruited into the Legion as a young adult, he rose through the ranks to become a frumentarius - Caesar's elite network of spies and infiltrators. For years, he has operated in the Mojave Wasteland, gathering intelligence on the NCR, the New Vegas families, and other factions. His current assignment places him on the New Vegas Strip, where he monitors the activities of high-profile individuals and reports directly to Caesar.
